text: BEFORE he went to feed with owls and bats%% Nebuchadnezzar had an ugly dream,
Nebuchadnezzar had an ugly dream, Worse than an Hus'if's when she thinks her cream
Worse than an Hus'if's when she thinks her cream%% Made a Naumachia for mice and rats.
Made a Naumachia for mice and rats. So scared, he sent for that 'Good King of Cats'
So scared, he sent for that 'Good King of Cats'%% Young Daniel, who soon did pluck away the beam
Young Daniel, who soon did pluck away the beam%% From out his eye, and said he did not deem
From out his eye, and said he did not deem%% The sceptre worth a straw his Cushions old door-mats.
The sceptre worth a straw his Cushions old door-mats. A horrid nightmare similar somewhat
A horrid nightmare similar somewhat%% Of late has haunted a most motley crew,
Of late has haunted a most motley crew, Most loggerheads and Chapmen we are told
Most loggerheads and Chapmen we are told%% That any Daniel tho' he be a sot
That any Daniel tho' he be a sot%% Can make the lying lips turn pale of hue
Can make the lying lips turn pale of hue%% By belching out 'ye are that head of Gold.'
